pullRequest.title: Further rework of the RestoreRedundancy data objects for serialization

commit.message: Converting a Duration to a Long because of Serialization

beforeCommit.message:
First clean run of Rest Command for Restore Redundancy
Cleanup of serializable issues.

afterCommit.message: Converting a Duration to a Long because of Serialization

nodes.bodyText: This could be replaced with totalPrimaryTransferTime += details.getPrimaryTransferTime();

This test sets multiple fields but does not verify all of them. Would it be possible to confirm that all data in the object is correctly serialized and deserialized, not just the message and status fields?
This can be replaced with totalPrimaryTransferTime += results.getTotalPrimaryTransferTime();
you can use assertJ's isEqualToComparingFieldByField method to compare all the fields are the same
